sqlMap.select: select f_lineid, f_modelid, f_killerid, f_updatetime from t_monster_lastkill
sqlMap.insert: insert into t_monster_lastkill (f_lineid, f_modelid, f_killerid, f_updatetime) values (#lineid:INTEGER#, #modelid:INTEGER#, #killerid:INTEGER#, #updatetime:DATE#)
sqlMap.update: update t_monster_lastkill set f_killerid = #killerid:INTEGER#, f_updatetime = #updatetime:DATE# where f_lineid = #lineid:INTEGER# and f_modelid = #modelid:INTEGER#
